bug.author: calvinjia
bug.summary: EMR integration does not work with embedded journal
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug When launching Alluxio with the given emr script, the master fails to come up due to the journal not being formatted. To Reproduce Start an Alluxio cluster with the instructions provided for Alluxio on EMR. Expected behavior The Alluxio cluster comes up successfully.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ns1123>@ns1123</denchmark-link> we need to run "alluxio format" before starting the cluster to format the cluster (master journal, worker dirs)
